long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An add-on  to pick & select web contents from web pages for WeBook,  you can edit & compile this web pages in WeBook to various ebook formats like EPUB,MOBI,AZW,PDF etc.
